mapper.select: SELECT user.user_name, user.user_email, product.category, product.price, payment.pay_date, payment.refund, payment.refund_reason, user.user_no, payment.merchant_id, payment.pay_id FROM user JOIN payment ON user.user_no = payment.user_no JOIN product ON payment.product_no = product.product_no
mapper.update: UPDATE payment join user on payment.user_no = user.user_no join SET payment.refund = 2, user.user_grade = 0 WHERE user.user_no = #{user_no} AND payment.refund = 1
